column1: # Transaction Category Balance Test Fixture Data
# CSV format converted from app/data/ASCII/tcatbal.txt for Spring Batch testing
# Provides comprehensive test scenarios for balance aggregation and financial precision validation
# last_updated: ISO 8601 timestamp for balance modification tracking
# 1. Composite primary key constraint testing with realistic account/category combinations
# 2. BigDecimal precision validation for financial calculations (DECIMAL(12
# 3. Balance aggregation testing across multiple categories per account
# 4. Category-specific balance tracking and calculation validation
# 5. Foreign key relationship testing with accounts and transaction_categories tables
# 7. High-precision decimal calculations maintaining COBOL COMP-3 equivalence
# 8. Timestamp validation for last_updated tracking scenarios
# Account 00000000001 - Multiple categories with various balance scenarios
# Account 00000000003 - Large balance amounts for precision validation
# Account 00000000004 - Edge case testing with minimal balances
# Account 00000000008 - Negative balances for debt scenarios
# Account 00000000009 - Zero balances for inactive categories
# Additional accounts for extended testing scenarios
# Account 00000000023 - Large category count per account
# Extended categories for comprehensive foreign key testing
